Module org.hdfgroup.hdfview
Package hdf.view.DataView

Interface DataView

All Known Subinterfaces:
ImageView, MetaDataView, PaletteView, TableView
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultBaseMetaDataView, DefaultBaseTableView, DefaultCompoundDSTableView, DefaultDatasetMetaDataView, DefaultDatatypeMetaDataView, DefaultGroupMetaDataView, DefaultImageView, DefaultLinkMetaDataView, DefaultPaletteView, DefaultScalarDSTableView
public interface DataView
The data view interface for displaying data objects
Version:
2.4 9/6/2007
Author:
Peter X. Cao
